id.description: Unique identifier for the purchase record.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user making the purchase.

product_id.description: Unique identifier for the product being purchased.

created_at.description: The date and time when the purchase record was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the purchase record was last updated.

added_to_cart_at.description: The date and time the product was added to the cart by the user.

purchased_at.description: The date and time the purchase was completed.

returned_at.description: The date and time the purchased product was returned by the user.
